changeSet.author: FokiDoki
changeSet.sql:
WITH inserted_attributes AS ( INSERT INTO attributes (name, type, org_id) VALUES ('ИНН', 'Юр. информация', 1), ('ОГРН', 'Юр. информация', 1), ('Юридический адрес', 'Юр. информация', 1), ('Отправитель', 'Персональные данные', 1), ('Получатель', 'Персональные данные', 1), ('Номер телефона отправителя', 'Персональные данные', 1), ('Электронная почта отправителя', 'Персональные данные', 1), ('Сумма (Руб)', 'Денежные', 1), ('НДС %', 'Денежные', 1), ('Номер документа', 'Идентификационные данные', 1) RETURNING attribute_id ), inserted_document_type AS ( INSERT INTO document_types (name, agreement_type, org_id) VALUES ('Договор поставки товаров', 'EVERYONE', 1), ('Договор аренды офисного помещения', 'QUORUM', 1), ('Лицензионное соглашение на программное обеспечение', 'EVERYONE', 1), ('Договор оказания услуг по IT-консалтингу', 'EVERYONE', 1), ('Договор аренды транспортного средства', 'ANYONE', 1) RETURNING type_id ) INSERT INTO type_attributes (type_id, attribute_id) VALUES ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 6)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 7)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 8)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 9)),
((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 8)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 9)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 4)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 7)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1)),
((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 6)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 8)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 9)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 7)),
((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 6)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 8)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 9)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 7)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2)),
((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 4), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 6)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 4), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 8)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 4), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 9)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 4), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 5)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 4), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 4)), ((SELECT type_id FROM inserted_document_type LIMIT 1 OFFSET 4), (SELECT attribute_id FROM inserted_attributes LIMIT 1 OFFSET 7))
